Html:
In my opinion there is missing to add "annotations" to pages:

- report page is wrong (the report might be sent to SM as a change request)

- add own note (which will be displayed with a question), will be very helpfull in Extreme English databases (a lot of synonyms..)

Is it possible to implement it?

(i czemu ja się męczę po angielsku? :)

Most of the features you are requesting can be found as bookmarks. You can

- mark any item with bookmark
- add your text
- navigate among previously selected bookmarks

Please check if this is engough for you

<form>
<input id="LIU_txt" style="border: 1px solid black; margin: 0pt; padding: 0pt; left: 0px; right: 240px; font-size: 14px ! important; height: 17px ! important; line-height: 50px; display: block;" /><select id="LIU_sel" style="border: 1px solid black; margin: 0pt; padding: 0pt; width: 100px; right: 138px; font-size: 14px ! important; height: 17px;"><option style="border: 0pt none; width: 30%; height: 19px;">Wictionary</option><option style="border: 0pt none; width: 30%; height: 19px;">Chambers (UK)</option><option style="border: 0pt none; width: 30%; height: 19px;">The Free Dictionary</option><option style="border: 0pt none; width: 30%; height: 19px;">WordNet</option><option style="border: 0pt none; width: 30%; height: 19px;">Urban Dictionary</option><option style="border: 0pt none; width: 30%; height: 19px;">Answers.com</option><option style="border: 0pt none; width: 30%; height: 19px;">rhymezone.com</option><option style="border: 0pt none; width: 30%; height: 19px;">Merriam-Webster</option><option style="border: 0pt none; width: 30%; height: 19px;">Dict.pl</option><option style="border: 0pt none; width: 30%; height: 19px;">MegaSłownik</option></select><input id="LIU_search" style="border: 1px solid black; padding: 0pt; width: 68px; right: 68px; font-size: 14px ! important; height: 19px;" type="submit" value="Search" /><button id="LIU_prev" style="border: 1px solid black; padding: 0pt; width: 20px; right: 46px; height: 19px;"><</button><button id="LIU_next" style="border: 1px solid black; padding: 0pt; width: 20px; right: 24px; height: 19px;">></button><button id="LIU_mode" style="border: 1px solid black; padding: 0pt; width: 20px; right: 2px; height: 19px;">0</button>
<button id="LIU_0" style="border: 1px solid black; padding: 0pt; width: 20px; margin-right: 2px; height: 19px; background-color: #dddddd;">v</button><button id="LIU_1" style="border: 1px solid black; padding: 0pt; width: 20px; margin-right: 2px; height: 19px; background-color: #dddddd;">c</button><button id="LIU_2" style="border: 1px solid black; padding: 0pt; width: 20px; margin-right: 2px; height: 19px; background-color: #dddddd;">f</button><button id="LIU_3" style="border: 1px solid black; padding: 0pt; width: 20px; margin-right: 2px; height: 19px; background-color: #dddddd;">o</button><button id="LIU_4" style="border: 1px solid black; padding: 0pt; width: 20px; margin-right: 2px; height: 19px; background-color: #dddddd;">u</button><button id="LIU_5" style="padding: 0pt; width: 20px; margin-right: 2px; height: 19px; background-color: white; border: 1px solid black black white;">a</button><button id="LIU_6" style="border: 1px solid black; padding: 0pt; width: 20px; margin-right: 2px; height: 19px; background-color: #dddddd;">r</button><button id="LIU_7" style="border: 1px solid black; padding: 0pt; width: 20px; margin-right: 2px; height: 19px; background-color: #dddddd;">b</button><button id="LIU_8" style="border: 1px solid black; padding: 0pt; width: 20px; margin-right: 2px; height: 19px; background-color: #dddddd;">s</button><button id="LIU_9" style="border: 1px solid black; padding: 0pt; width: 20px; margin-right: 2px; height: 19px; background-color: #dddddd;">m</button>
</form>
